MVC

Class TowerDefenseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • MVC.TowerDefenseController

  • public class TowerDefenseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    YongqiJia & JasonFukumoto & QingzhouPan & GuojunWei CSC 335, Fall 2019 Team Project The controller class makes operations like read map info and put it into model, makes place, sell tower, tower attack and enemy move

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TowerDefenseController(TowerDefenseView towerDefenseView)
      constructor initialize the model, create the stage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLevel()
      add level by 1 as called in model
      void fps()
      what happens in each frame per time unit, if no enemies on the board, launch the first wave, when the enemy is in the tower range, let tower make damage, if enemy is dead, remove it from the enemy list, also makes the enemy move, model is changed and notify the view in the model fps()
      int get_imagePos()
      return the image number(index) from the model
      int[][] get_intBoard() 
      int getBalance()
      get balance from the model
      int getCol()
      get x coordinate from model
      Tower getLCT()
      get last click tower from the model
      int getLEVEL()
      get level(map) from model
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPathCoord() 
      int getRow()
      get y coordinate from model
      Tower getTowerAt(int x, int y)
      return the tower position on the board
      java.util.ArrayList<Tower> getTowerList()
      get the towerlist from the model
      java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> helper(java.lang.String[] wave)
      this helper function initialize the enemy and add it to the corresponding wave, and give a UID, so that each enemy is differnt
      boolean is_tower_here(int x, int y)
      Checks to see if a position on the grid is taken.
      void load()
      read (deserialize) the "savedFile.ser" to the java file
      void new_tower_to_LCT(java.lang.String towerType)
      set tower object to the model setLCT
      void placeTower(int x, int y)
      Calls model to place tower then sets last clicked tower to null.
      void refrashEndStatus()
      change map either enemies are killed or exit the map
      void removeEnemy(Enemy key)
      get rid of enemy when it's killed
      void save()
      serialize the current gaming data(java file) to the "savedFile.ser" file

      call sellTower from the model

        public void fps()
